mapper.select: select a.id, a.title, a.content, b.id as userid, a.categoryList, a.heart, a.postdate, a.views from board_post a, users b where categoryList=4 and a.writer=b.usernum order by a.id desc
select a.id, a.title, a.content, b.id as user_id, a.categoryList, a.heart, a.postdate, a.views from board_post a, users b where categoryList=4 and a.writer=b.usernum and a.id=#{param1}
mapper.update: update board_post set views=#{param1} where id=#{param2}
mapper.select: select * from (select id, lead(id,1,9999) over(order by id) as next, lag(id,1,0) over(order by id) as prev from board_post where categoryList=4) where id=#{param1}
